title: Far From Earth
lyrics:
Can we find a way
To live in outer space
Take me for a ride
Leave it all behind
We run

Far from the Earth and the Sun

We run

Far from the Earth and the Sun

I fall in behind

And we'll leave in the dark



Living on the edge

Tense me with regret

Hold onto my arms

Lead me just enough



We run

Far from the Earth and the Sun

We run

Far from the Earth and the Sun

I fall in behind

And we'll leave in the dark



Run

Far from the Earth and the Sun

(Run, far from the Earth and the Sun)



We run

Far from the Earth and the Sun

We run

Far from the Earth and the Sun

I fall in behind

And we'll leave in the dark
